Dear {!Contact.Name},
IATA Code: {!Account.IATACode__c}
This is a friendly reminder that the PCI DSS Attestation of Compliance or Nil Credit Card Self-Declaration has to be uploaded according to the already communicated deadline. If you have submitted the evidence already, please disregard this message.
We would like highlight that the submission deadline date is {!TODAY()+15} (mm/dd/yyyy).
If you want to learn more about how to become PCI DSS compliance, please visit our web page: http://www.iata.org/services/finance/Pages/pci-dss.aspx
Should you need any further information from IATA, please do not hesitate to login a new query via our Customer Portal:
http://www.iata.org/cs
Yours sincerily,
Agency Management International Air Transport Association ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- In order to obtain information or assistance from IATA, do not hesitate to access at any time our Customer Portal
